<title level="1" right="Trait">[Skeleton](/Traits.aspx?ID=772)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 363 <sup>1.1</sup>

This undead is made by animating a dead creature's skeleton with void energy.
name: Skeleton
